statements: SELECT * FROM image_gallery_images;
SELECT image_id, full_image_url FROM image_gallery_images;
SELECT full_image_url, thumbnail_url FROM image_gallery_images ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM image_gallery_images WHERE image_id = 3;
SELECT thumbnail_url FROM image_gallery_images WHERE image_id IN (1, 2, 4);
SELECT * FROM image_gallery_images ORDER BY image_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_id, full_image_url FROM image_gallery_images WHERE image_id > 100 ORDER BY image_id ASC;
SELECT image_id, thumbnail_url FROM image_gallery_images WHERE thumbnail_url LIKE '%.png';
SELECT * FROM image_gallery_images WHERE image_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_images FROM image_gallery_images WHERE image_id < 50;
SELECT * FROM thumbnails;
SELECT id, image_name FROM thumbnails WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_name FROM thumbnails ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, thumbnail_data FROM thumbnails WHERE image_name LIKE 'image%';
SELECT id, image_name, thumbnail_data FROM thumbnails JOIN full_size_images ON thumbnails.id = full_size_images.thumbnail_id;
SELECT * FROM thumbnails WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_name, thumbnail_data FROM thumbnails WHERE image_name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT id, image_name FROM full_size_images ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT f.id, t.image_name FROM full_size_images f JOIN thumbnails t ON f.thumbnail_id = t.id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_thumbnails, MAX(id) AS max_thumbnail_id FROM thumbnails;
SELECT * FROM image_thumbnails
SELECT thumbnail_url FROM image_thumbnails WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, image_url, image_description FROM full_size_images
SELECT caption FROM image_gallery ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM image_gallery WHERE thumbnail_id = 2
SELECT * FROM image_thumbnails LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, thumbnail_url FROM image_thumbnails ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT thumbnail_id, caption FROM image_gallery WHERE full_size_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM full_size_images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, image_description FROM full_size_images WHERE image_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT image_link FROM FullSizeImages WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, thumbnail_link FROM ImageThumbnails ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT Users.username, FullSizeImages.image_link FROM Users INNER JOIN FullSizeImages ON Users.user_id = FullSizeImages.thumbnail_id;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT u.username, i.image_link, t.thumbnail_link FROM Users u JOIN UserLikes ul ON u.user_id = ul.user_id JOIN FullSizeImages i ON ul.image_id = i.id JOIN ImageThumbnails t ON i.thumbnail_id = t.id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(ul.image_id) AS total_likes FROM Users u JOIN UserLikes ul ON u.user_id = ul.user_id GROUP BY u.username;

SELECT u.username, i.image_link, t.thumbnail_link FROM Users u LEFT JOIN UserLikes ul ON u.user_id = ul.user_id LEFT JOIN FullSizeImages i ON ul.image_id = i.id LEFT JOIN ImageThumbnails t ON i.thumbnail_id = t.id;
SELECT * FROM ImageMetadata;
SELECT image_name, image_description FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM ImageTags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT image_id, full_size_data FROM FullSizeImages WHERE image_id = '456e7890-12d3-a456-e89b-123a456b789c';
SELECT image_id, tag_name FROM ImageTagMapping INNER JOIN ImageTags ON ImageTagMapping.tag_id = ImageTags.tag_id ORDER BY image_id;
SELECT * FROM Thumbnails;
SELECT image_id, thumbnail_data FROM Thumbnails WHERE thumbnail_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT t.thumbnail_id, f.image_id, i.image_name FROM Thumbnails t INNER JOIN FullSizeImages f ON t.image_id = f.image_id INNER JOIN ImageMetadata i ON f.image_id = i.image_id;
SELECT i.image_name, i.image_description, t.tag_name FROM ImageMetadata i INNER JOIN ImageTagMapping m ON i.image_id = m.image_id INNER JOIN ImageTags t ON m.tag_id = t.tag_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS tag_count, t.tag_name FROM ImageTags t INNER JOIN ImageTagMapping m ON t.tag_id = m.tag_id GROUP BY t.tag_name ORDER BY tag_count DESC;
